name: aedg_office_hvac_fan_coil_doas
display_name: AEDG Office Hvac Fan Coil Doas

arguments.name: ceilingReturnPlenumSpaceType
arguments.display_name: This space type should be part of a ceiling return air plenum
arguments.default_value: We dont want a default, this is an optional argument
choices: We dont want a default, this is an optional argument

arguments.name: remake_schedules
arguments.display_name: Apply recommended availability and ventilation schedules for air handlers

name_xml: AEDG Office HVAC Fan Coil DOAS
modeler_description: Airloops are dedicated to ventilation (DOAS) and have constant speed fan operation and hot and chilled water coils.  Conditioning is provided at the zone level with four pipe fan coils with cycling fan operation.  Chiller for DOAS and fan coils is air-cooled.
description: Measure replaces existing HVAC system (if any) with a Fan Coil with DOAS HVAC system (one DOAS per floor).  The fan coil with DOAS system (centralized DOAS, with zone level conditioning) is applied to all space types.  In select cases, the user is given the option to preserve existing HVAC schedules.  In other cases, new schedules are generated that align with AEDG recommendations.  The resulting HVAC system reflects the HVAC recommendations of the 50% Small and Medium Office AEDG.
